trailingComments.value:
*
 * Add content to an archive.
 * @promise Add
 * @param archive {string} Path to the archive.
 * @param files {string|array} Files to add.
 * @param options {Object} An object of acceptable options to 7za bin.
 * @resolve {array} Arguments passed to the child-process.
 * @progress {array} Listed files and directories.
 * @reject {Error} The error as issued by 7-Zip.

leadingComments.value: Convert array of files into a string if needed.

trailingComments.value: Create a string that can be parsed by `run`.

leadingComments.value: Create a string that can be parsed by `run`.

trailingComments.value: When a stdout is emitted, parse each line and search for a pattern. When
the pattern is found, extract the file (or directory) name from it and
pass it to an array. Finally returns this array in the progress function.

leadingComments.value: When a stdout is emitted, parse each line and search for a pattern. When
the pattern is found, extract the file (or directory) name from it and
pass it to an array. Finally returns this array in the progress function.

trailingComments.value: When all is done resolve the Promise.

leadingComments.value: When all is done resolve the Promise.

trailingComments.value: Catch the error and pass it to the reject function of the Promise.

leadingComments.value: Catch the error and pass it to the reject function of the Promise.

*
 * Add content to an archive.
 * @promise Add
 * @param archive {string} Path to the archive.
 * @param files {string|array} Files to add.
 * @param options {Object} An object of acceptable options to 7za bin.
 * @resolve {array} Arguments passed to the child-process.
 * @progress {array} Listed files and directories.
 * @reject {Error} The error as issued by 7-Zip.
